sentences.en: They have just returned from faraway places with wonderful stories to tell.
sentences.cn: 他们刚从一些遥远的地方回来，有很多精彩的故事要讲。

sentences.en: There once was a king in a faraway country.
sentences.cn: 从前在一个遥远的国家有一位国王。

sentences.en: We flew on a small plane to a faraway village.
sentences.cn: 我们乘一架小飞机到一个遥远的村庄。
